attributes.action: To stop false and forced adoptions
attributes.additional_details: Because what social services are doing is criminal and illegal they are ripping families apart with the way they deal with cases it needs to stop
attributes.background: I want Government to look into all false adoptions and court cases that social services have illegal removed children and put a stop to it

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign some of these petitions:

End Forced Adoption: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/330451

Reform Family Separation System: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/319465

If you you are unhappy with decisions made by child social services or a court then you should seek advice about how to complain about or appeal these decisions.
